opendial.gui

Class TextOnlyInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.gui.TextOnlyInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class TextOnlyInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module
    Text-only interface to OpenDial, to use when no X11 display is available.
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
